item.title: RoutingGraphWriterTask creates invalid output for spain.osm.pbf, because of tab character in street name
item.description:
From t.be...@web.de on August 14, 2011 23:19:11
Unable to process spain.osm.pbf because street name contains tab character. This results in invalid sql file.
[exec] psql:data/temp/spain.sql:38: NOTICE: CREATE TABLE / PRIMARY KEY will create implicit index "pk_rge" for table "rg_edge" [exec] psql:data/temp/spain.sql:2362228: ERROR: extra data after last expected column [exec] KONTEXT: COPY rg_edge, line 32410: "32409 178165 819982 9623018 Valle de Cabu√©rniga-Espinilla-Salcedillo CA-280 752.0203506413507 f..." <<<<<<<<
RoutingGraphWriterTask.toPgString(String) should eventually contain something like
return s.replaceAll("\t", " ").trim();
,to erase the tabulator from the strings.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=166

item.contents:
From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on August 18, 2011 09:54:06
Assigned the issue to the appropriate component owners.
Status: Accepted Owner: Fels.Rob...@gmail.com Cc: thilo.ra...@fu-berlin.de

From Fels.Rob...@gmail.com on September 13, 2011 10:21:30
Thx, didn't know that with the 4 backslashes, it just looks weird :) But yeah should work.
Cheers
